sense.def:
A veneer
je vedênje, s katerim prikrivamo resnična čustva ali značaj.

seg.quote: He hides his values beneath a veneer of scientific objectivity.

sense.def:
Veneer
je tanek sloj lesa ali plastike; z njim izboljšamo videz neke površine.

seg.quote: ...a table whose veneer had come loose.
